rukus.text: Day ur twalam ara, Inub Oebbi fellawen s wayen akw illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt? Isserwa yawen l$it iS, uvhio, uffir. U llan l$aci i ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni, ne$ nnhaya, ne$ Tazmamt timnewweot
Ma nnan asen: "ddut akked wayen id Issader Oebbi", a d inin: "xaii, a neddu akked wayen id nufa ar imezwura nne$". I ma Cciian atan la ten inecced ar uaaqeb n tmes
Win ifkan i Oebbi udem amvua, u neppa d aaeovi, iiief deg ufus iueeean mavi. Ar Oebbi, tu$alin n lumuo
Win ijehlen, ur k t$webben tjehli s! £uone£, tu$alin nnsen; ad asen Nini acu xedmen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
A ten Neoo ad zhun cwii, sinna, a Neeppem fellasen aaaqeb iwaaoen
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan"? A d inin, war ccekk: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi". Maca, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
I Oebbi i illan akw di tmurt akked igenwan. Ih, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Xas lukan ttjuo akw n ddunit d leqlamat, u yill, ernu yas ua ilellen nniven, d lmidad nnsen, ur pqamen awalen n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Lxelq nnwen, tanekra nnwen, amzun d yiman yiwen kan. Ih, Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Day ur twalav ara, Oebbi Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. Ieeppem i yiiij akked waggur ad leun, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Akka, acku Oebbi d Tidep. Ayen u$uo naaoen, war Neppa, d tikerkas. Oebbi, d Aalayan, d Ameqwoan
Day ur twalav ara ssfina, teppazal di yill s lqwedoa n Oebbi, iwakken ad awen d Issenaat seg issekniyen iS. Ih, deg wayagi, issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ma tesbur asen lmuja, am tillas, ad nujen ar Oebbi, $uoeS s ddin azedgan. Mi ten Isellek ar lberr, kra, degsen, iifen deg wawal nnsen. I inekoen issekniyen nne£, siwa yal axeddaa ajehli

A yimdanen! Eezzbet i Mass nnwen. Agwadet ass ideg ababat ur d ilehhu d mmi s, u mmi s ur d ilehhu d baba s, s wacemma. Ih, lemaahda n Oebbi, d tidep. Ur kwen tep$uoou tmeddurt n ddunit. Ur kwen issefoa$ im$weooi, $ef Oebbi
Oebbi, s tidep, $uoeS tamusni n yimir. Issadar ed ageffur. Ieoa i illan di taabbuvin. Ur ieoi yiwen acu ara ikseb azekka; ur ieoi yiwen anwa akal ideg ara immet. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa, d Amusnaw
